long_description: Furnished with a few choice extras, the Elie Sound 120 XE kayak brings the serenity of the local pond, lake or river within easy reach. Stable and fun, the Elie Sound 120 XE kayak offers beginning and intermediate paddlers a fun experience on calm waters. 3-layer polyethylene includes a special resin in the top layer, resulting in an unusually stiff, light and responsive watercraft. Specialized thermoforming process fuses together the deck and the hull under high pressure and heat. Large cockpit makes it easy to get into kayak, and soft padded seat ensures you have a fun, comfortable paddle. Backrest supports your paddle stroke with noticeable flex, and you can adjust the height to dial in the support. Storage area at the front of the cockpit features a small day hatch with a dry bag and includes a beverage holder. Padded cockpit offers comfort for your knees and thighs. Large footbraces adjust to ensure a comfortable paddling position. Extended keel enhances tracking. Quick-lock hatch cover features a hinged design and locking lever; to open hatch, simply slide lever to unlock cover and flip open to access gear. Stern bulkhead helps keep contents of hatch dry and organized. Includes reflective perimeter lines, bungee storage and carry handles that fit into your hands.
short_description: Furnished with a few choice extras, the Elie Sound 120 XE kayak brings the serenity of the local pond, lake or river within easy reach.
